title: Sea Terraces
content: One of the most spectacular neo-tectonic phenomena in lran is the lofty sea terraces in Cha Bahar region. These terraces are uplifted lands created through the seduction of Arabic plate beneath the Iranian plate. ln some places, the altitude of these terraces mounts to over 100m. the landscape of Oman sea from above these terraces is so eye-catching.

gallery.caption: ST2-1 :High marginal walls near Chah Bahar
ST2-2 :A coastal cliff eroded by sea waves
ST2-3 :A landscape of lofty sea coasts (cliffs) stretched so far ( west view)
ST2-4 :An part of lofty sea terraces
